# Eclipse/STS Workspace (CRITICAL - fixes your errors)
.metadata/
.project
.classpath
.settings/
.sts4-cache/
.recommenders/

# Maven build artifacts
target/
*.jar
*.war
*.ear
*.class

# Gradle
.gradle/
build/
!.gradle/wrapper
!.gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.jar

# Logs
*.log
logs/
.m2/repository/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
.DS_Store?

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Runtime data
pids/
data/
logs/

# Environment variables
.env
*.env

# Docker
docker-compose.override.yml
*.log

# Application secrets (your SendGrid keys!)
application-local.yml
application-dev.yml
application.properties

# Keep these (your source code)
!src/
!pom.xml
!application.yml
